ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank the healers and merchants for medicinal information of T. lucida aerial parts. We also thank students Omar Guadarrama, Antonio Monroy, Adriana Flores, and Nancy Muciño for their technical assistance. In addition, we thank all the technical staff of the USAII, N. Balbiaux for her support in obtaining the NMR spectra, J. Pérez-Flores from I. Q. for processing the GC/MS experiments, and I. Chávez for professional counseling. We also thank Marissa González for proof-reading the English version of the manuscript.
